title: Country Icon Kenny Chesney ‘Can Finally Exhale’ After Completing This Major Career Achievement
description: The best-selling country star's memoir, 'Heart Live Music,' written with Holly Gleason, will be published on Nov. 4.
content:
Country Icon Kenny Chesney ‘Can Finally Exhale’ After Completing This Major Career Achievement originally appeared on Parade.

The country icon says “finally” he “can exhale” after completing his long-in-the-works memoir with co-writer, noted music journalist Holly Gleason.

🎬 SIGN UP for Parade's Daily newsletter to get the latest pop culture news & celebrity interviews delivered right to your inbox 🎬

Titled Heart Live Music, the book will be published on Nov. 4, Chesney announced on Monday, Aug. 11.

“What they don’t tell you,” Chesney said in a statement, “is how much goes into polishing, how many times you’ll read it… or how many moments you’ll have to leave out. But for me, I really wanted to send a love letter to all the places and characters along the way that made this journey such an incredible ride. When I look back, I can’t believe the people I’ve met, the stories I’ve heard and the music I’ve been able to hear from songwriters, other artists, as well as all the songs I’ve been fortunate enough to cut.”

The book examines his journey from a child growing up in the Smoky Mountains to becoming a stadium-worthy music act over the past two decades.

“We were trying to create snapshots of my journey, vignettes of my soul,” Chesney explained, “and lots of my friends since I started on this magic carpet ride. I moved to Nashville in January 1991, and here we are, talking about it in this book. Sitting here looking at the ocean, hearing these waves crashing, we can’t wait. Especially if you’ve been part of this journey, I can’t wait for you to relive it…and for those who weren’t part of this journey, we hope you take something from this and apply it to your life, we can’t for you to hear it, errr, read it.”

Chesney will celebrate the completion of the book by dropping into his No Shoes Radio channel on SiriusXM to talk about the book in the lead up to its publication.

Related: This Singer Was Just Named the No. 1 Country Artist of the 21st Century

Country Icon Kenny Chesney ‘Can Finally Exhale’ After Completing This Major Career Achievement first appeared on Parade on Aug 11, 2025

This story was originally reported by Parade on Aug 11, 2025, where it first appeared.

keywords.name: co-writer, noted music journalist Holly Gleason

summary: Country icon Kenny Chesney has completed a long-awaited memoir, titled Heart Live Music, with co-writer Holly Gleason. The book will be published on Nov. 4 and will examine Chesney's journey from a child growing up in the Smoky Mountains to becoming a stadium-worthy music act. Chesney plans to celebrate the completion of the book by hosting No Shoes Radio on SiriusXM to discuss it.
shortSummary: Kenny Chesney finally completed his long-awaited memoir "Can Finally Exhale" after completing a career milestone, releasing it on Nov. 4, with his co-writer Holly Gleason.
argos_summary: Kenny Chesney has completed his long-awaited memoir, titled "Heart Live Music," set to be published on November 4. Co-written with music journalist Holly Gleason, the book reflects on his journey from childhood in the Smoky Mountains to becoming a major music star. Chesney describes the memoir as a love letter to the people and experiences that shaped his career, and he looks forward to sharing it with fans.
